ygData.subject: Ghoulbane
ygData.msgSnippet: Ghoulbane - item #1 of the (achievable) wish list of any young paladin. Rumour has it that the Froglock Lord in Upper Guk, the one who supposedly drops
ygData.messageBody:
Ghoulbane - item #1 of the (achievable) wish list of any young paladin.

Rumour has it that the Froglock Lord in Upper Guk, the one who supposedly drops Ghoulbane, is level 35. But, is it?

I play on the Tunare server, one of the younger servers - people on Tunare are already nicely into the 30s (Ah, those superlevelling druids). Heck, I'm only L22 but keep chipping away at it.

Consequently, if the rumours are true, it strikes me that Ghoulbane should have been liberated by now on an older server, say Fennin Ro.

Surely therefore, one of our fellow paladins can shed light onto the age old question: "When can we take the Froglock Lord?".

Let's hope the mist is lifted...

Llorfindal
High Elf Paladin of Tunare
Looking to trade in his shiny brass halberd
